name: Weapon Of An Ungrateful Son
Lore: 'When Vader dueled Luke at Cloud City, he fought a son trained by his former master and a weapon constructed by his former self.',
Text: 'USED: If a lightsaber was just used to enhance a Force drain, place it in owner''s Used Pile.LOST: Place any or all of you devices and character weapons on table in your Used Pile.',
